ai-patthana16.69:0.2_0: (This should be expanded as in SN 4.)
ai-patthana16.69:0.3_0: There is immediately bite for a mind that’s not,
ai-patthana16.69:1.1_0: I don’t mix closely with the mind.
ai-patthana16.69:1.1_1: Attached to mind doesn’t occupy the mind, and doesn’t exertion of the mind. Relying on the practice that leads to the continuation of the mind. ...
ai-patthana16.69:1.1_2: I don’t mix closely with the mind of the mind, the removal of thirst, and the mind.
